title: Preventive medicine as a new NESA discipline
body: The NESA launched a medical university named the 3H Medical University (Honora Honore Humanae â€“ respect human dignity), which is based on centres of excellence. In November 2009, the First Academic Board Planning Meeting took place in Berlin. Delegates from 12 countries participated in the meeting. On 27 March, 2014 the Founders' Committee and the Curriculum Committee met in Berlin and approved the curriculum framework and the plans for further development.
